Plaxico Burress is scheduled to be released from prison June 6 provided he gets credit time for good behavior and, like Michael Vick , plans to resume his NFL career as soon as possible. Raila Odinga said the AU and West African bloc ECOWAS both want a peaceful, negotiated settlement to the crisis in Ivory Coast but other measures must be considered. Given the grave risk the continuation of this crisis poses to Ivorians and the people and the states in the region, Africa must stand ready to deploy other measures if a settlement can not be agreed through negotiations, he told reporters.
